verses.verse: Then Job <S%H347><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>,
I have heard <S%H8085><s%> many such things <S%H7227><s%>: Miserable <S%H5999><s%> comforters are ye all <S%H5162><s%>.
Shall vain <S%H7307><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> have an end <S%H7093><s%>? Or what provoketh <S%H4834><s%> thee that thou answerest <S%H6030><s%>?

I also could speak <S%H1696><s%> as ye do <S%H3863><s%>; If your soul <S%H5315><s%> were <S%H3426><s%> in my soul <S%H5315><s%>'s stead <S%H2266><s%>, I could join words <S%H4405><s%> together against you <S%H5128><s%>, And shake my head <S%H7218><s%> at you <S%H1119><s%>.
But I would strengthen <S%H553><s%> you with <S%H1119><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, And the solace <S%H5205><s%> of my lips <S%H8193><s%> would assuage your grief <S%H2820><s%>.
Though I speak <S%H1696><s%>, my grief <S%H3511><s%> is not assuaged <S%H2820><s%>; And though I forbear <S%H2308><s%>, what am I eased <S%H1980><s%>?
But now he hath made me weary <S%H3811><s%>: Thou hast made desolate <S%H8074><s%> all my company <S%H5712><s%>.

And thou hast laid fast hold <S%H7059><s%> on me <S%H5707><s%>, which is a witness against me <S%H3585><s%>: And my leanness riseth up <S%H6965><s%> against me <S%H6030><s%>, It testifieth to my face <S%H6440><s%>.

He hath torn <S%H2963><s%> me in his wrath <S%H639><s%>, and persecuted <S%H7852><s%> me <S%H2786><s%>; He hath gnashed upon me with his teeth <S%H8127><s%>: Mine adversary <S%H6862><s%> sharpeneth <S%H3913><s%> his eyes upon me <S%H5869><s%>.

They have gaped <S%H6473><s%> upon me with their mouth <S%H6310><s%>; They have smitten <S%H5221><s%> me upon the cheek <S%H3895><s%> reproachfully <S%H2781><s%>: They gather <S%H4390><s%> themselves together against me <S%H3162><s%>.
God <S%H410><s%> delivereth <S%H5462><s%> me to the ungodly <S%H5760><s%>, And casteth me into <S%H3399><s%> the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.

I was at ease <S%H7961><s%>, and he brake me asunder <S%H6565><s%>; Yea <S%H270><s%>, he hath taken me by the neck <S%H6203><s%>, and dashed me to pieces <S%H6327><s%>: He hath also set me up <S%H6965><s%> for his mark <S%H4307><s%>.

His archers <S%H7228><s%> compass me round about <S%H5437><s%>; He cleaveth <S%H6398><s%> my reins <S%H3629><s%> asunder <S%H6398><s%>, and doth not spare <S%H2550><s%>; He poureth out <S%H8210><s%> my gall <S%H4845><s%> upon the ground <S%H776><s%>.
He breaketh <S%H6555><s%> me with breach <S%H6556><s%> upon <S%H6440><s%> breach <S%H6556><s%>; He runneth <S%H7323><s%> upon me like a giant <S%H1368><s%>.
I have sewed <S%H8609><s%> sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> upon my skin <S%H1539><s%>, And have laid <S%H5953><s%> my horn <S%H7161><s%> in the dust <S%H6083><s%>.
My face <S%H6440><s%> is red <S%H2560><s%> with weeping <S%H1065><s%>, And on my eyelids <S%H6079><s%> is the shadow of death <S%H6757><s%>;
Although there is no violence <S%H2555><s%> in my hands <S%H3709><s%>, And my prayer <S%H8605><s%> is pure <S%H2134><s%>.
O earth <S%H776><s%>, cover <S%H3680><s%> not thou my blood <S%H1818><s%>, And let my cry <S%H2201><s%> have no resting <S%H4725><s%> -place.
Even now <S%H5707><s%>, behold, my witness is in heaven <S%H8064><s%>, And he that voucheth <S%H7717><s%> for me is on high <S%H4791><s%>.
My friends <S%H7453><s%> scoff <S%H3887><s%> at me <S%H5869><s%>: But mine eye poureth out <S%H1811><s%> tears unto God <S%H433><s%>,
That he would maintain <S%H3198><s%> the right of a man <S%H1397><s%> with God <S%H433><s%>, And of a son of man <S%H120><s%> with his neighbor <S%H1121><s%>!
For when a few <S%H4557><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> are come <S%H857><s%>, I shall go <S%H1980><s%> the way <S%H734><s%> whence I shall not return <S%H7725><s%>.
